BR_text.BRsummary: "Illegal instruction" when using tensorflow on SciServer Compute
BR_text.BRdescription:
When running the CIFAR10 example, the following error is thrown:
 <denchmark-code>ERROR conda.cli.main_run:execute(32): Subprocess for 'conda run ['python', 'main.py']' command failed.  (See above for error)
 /home/idies/miniconda3/envs/deepforge/.tmpt3a3veq5: line 3:   812 Illegal instruction     (core dumped) python main.py
 </denchmark-code>
